valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Wed 17 Dec 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Thu 18 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low 350 miles southwest of Iceland 945 expected 200 miles west of Bailey 961 by midday tomorrow. New low expected northwest Plymouth 995 by same time
